channel.title: Help? new at this stuff :[]
channel.description:
hey guys, recently tried to setup my own server. ive downloaded a source, and a client, created a host on no-ip, done portforwarding ( just to clear things up. i have a modem but have chosen to use the u-torrent > preferences > connection > change port to 43594 option of portforwarding. im told this works. if not please Post because i cant even get into my Internet IP thing due to a user and pass which i have NO idea what it is) now i have the source and client but i dont know where to go from there... ive opened the run.bat in my source folder but it says 'agspking.no-ip.biz' but i want it to connect to Finalblitz.no-ip.biz ... dont know whats going on there. also i think im missing alot. please help...
ADD MY MSN. ITS EASIIIIER THEN POSTING ON HERE LOL... Wolf_._._@hotmail.com
thanks, - Jayce
heres a picture of what i have got on my computer so far.
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss217/Retorical/Lmao2-1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help? new at this stuff :[]
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If your runnning a server on your computer you are the host so the IP of your server is your IP (e.g 255.255.255.255) which convieniently is redirected to Finalblitz.no-ip.biz (next time dont use your real IP).

Ignore the message,

Read full topic
